MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 24-NOV-2020 23:59.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell, affecting properties in Snead View and surrounding areas. Our engineers needed to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:00pm due to a fault on our underground cable network caused by 3rd party damage outside 10 Snead View and this may affect the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:12pm on Tuesday, 24 November 2020
